data.short_description: Twitch emoji act unexpectedly without using colons
data.steps_to_repro: - Add Twitch connection to your account - Subscribe to any Twitch streamer and join their server - Subscribe to Discord Nitro - Create a new server and place it above the Twitch streamer's on your server list - Create a new emoji on the new server and name it after one of the subscriber emoji from the Twitch streamer's server - Type out and send the name of the emoji you copied on the new server without colons in any channel except one in the streamer's server
